name: Pluto's Revenge (vijit101)
description:
The power to control a planet at your finger tips.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Brief Story line -

The game is a hyper casual game  with a Story line where you play as the angry planet Pluto. He is angry for not being acknowledged as a planet anymore.Pluto lost his identity and now is heart broken. Now Pluto vows to take revenge on the planets. Join in the battle of Pluto, and make it a planet again. BEING PLANET :-) 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

For - 

Android devices 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Level Type-

Path to Boss  - 

Play the level normally to reach a boss Planet 

Boss Fight - 

Remember only same colors deflects . Deflect some damage to win the level .

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls - LEFT TAP !! RIGHT TAP !! TAP !!
